content: this legal text is a summary of a court case that took place in arezzo on 08022011 the case involved a legal succession and compensation the court declared the legal succession of a person named ra mi and assigned them a 12 share in a real estate complex the court also dissolved a community and assigned full ownership of a property to specific individuals certain individuals were ordered to pay specific amounts to other parties for their shares all parties were also ordered to pay the costs of the proceedings the judgment will be transcribed by the conservatoria dei rrii in arezzo this ruling was made on february 8 2011
